Constructor Detail

URLListener

public URLListener(java.awt.Window container,
                   BrowserIF browser,
                   java.net.URL address)
Creates a new instance of the URLListener class to handle hyperlinks embeded in applications/applets.
Parameters:
container:Ljava.awt.Window - the window containing the URL for which the mouse icon will change.
browser:Ljjb.toolbox.net.BrowserIF - the object implementing the BrowserIF interface, which is capable of redirecting the browser to a new Internet resource.
address:Ljava.net.URL - the uniform resource locator object.
Method Detail

mouseEntered

public void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
mouseEntered is called when the user moves his/her mouse over the hyperlink object in the UI. The method then proceeds in setting the mouse cursor to a pointing hand.
Overrides:
mouseEntered in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
Parameters:
me:Ljava.awt.event.MouseEvent - encapsulating information about the event - mouse entered.

mouseExited

public void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
mouseExited is called when the user moves the mouse outside of the hyperlink object area in the UI. the method then sets the mouse back to the default, arrow.
Overrides:
mouseExited in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
Parameters:
me:Ljava.awt.event.MouseEvent - encapsulating information about the event - mouse exited.

mousePressed

public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
mousePressed triggers the hyperlink and causes the BrowserIF object to retrieve the resource (content) at the specified URL.
Overrides:
mousePressed in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
Parameters:
me:Ljava.awt.event.MouseEvent - encapsulating information about the event - mouse pressed.
